name: Slime, The Remedy
description:
'Slime, The Remedy' is a cinematic platformer game where you play as a slime exploring a dangerous building to find a remedy to the plague that tranformed all the humans into slimes after a nuclear explosion.

To move, use Q and D (or A and D).
To jump, use Space.
And to split, use Enter.
The mouse is only required in the main menu.

Press Echap to return to the main menu.
You can select where to start in the main menu.
The controls displayed in the game are set in AZERTY.
At the end of the game, there is no way to quit exept Alt + F4.

/!\ If you spam 'split' too much there is a chance that you can no longer split. If it happen, press Echap to restart or die to respawn. There are other bugs but the game is playable and enjoyable.

This game was made in 2 mounths for a cinematic platformer workshop. 
The constraints were : • Tell a story without any words
                                                   • Use only black, white and an other color

Game made by KALI Houssein, FETAS Julien, BIGNON Timothé, PERRAUD Eugénie and KACIMI Haris.
